description: Chishio`s Zangoose participated in the fake Pok√©mon Hustle event that Team Rocket put on. After stealing the Poke balls, Zangoose was sent out to protect Chishio from Meowth who attempted to recover the `stolen` Pokemon. Zangoose`s X-Scissor quickly defeated Meowth but stalled Chishio and Atsuki long enough for Officer Jenny and Ash to intercept them. Zangoose was then defeated by Pikachu.
name: Zangoose (Chishio)
